00065         int C74_EXPORT main(void)
00066         {       
00067                 // object initialization, NEW STYLE
00068                 t_class *c;
00069                 
00070                 c = class_new("OMax.state2id", (method)OMax_state2id_new, (method)OMax_state2id_free, (long)sizeof(t_OMax_state2id), 
00071                                           0L /* leave NULL!! */, A_GIMME, 0);
00072                 
00073                 // assistance
00074                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_state2id_assist,"assist",A_CANT, 0); 
00075                 
00076                 // input methods
00077                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_state2id_do, "int", 0);
00078                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_state2id_setname, "set", A_DEFSYM, 0);
00079                 
00080                 class_register(CLASS_BOX, c); /* CLASS_NOBOX */
00081                 OMax_state2id_class = c;
00082                 
00083                 return 0;
00084         }

00091         void *OMax_state2id_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00092         {
00093                 t_OMax_state2id *x = NULL;
00094                 
00095                 // object instantiation, NEW STYLE
00096                 if ((x = (t_OMax_state2id *)object_alloc(OMax_state2id_class)))
00097                 {
00098                         // outlet init
00099                         x->out_begindate = intout(x);
00100                         x->out_enddate = intout(x);
00101                         
00103                         x->obound = FALSE;
00104                         if (argc > 0)
00105                         {
00106                                 if (argv->a_type != A_SYM)
00107                                         object_error((t_object *)x,"First argument must be a symbol (name of an existing Oracle)");
00108                                 else
00109                                         x->oname = atom_getsym(argv);
00110                         }
00111             else
00112                 x->oname = NULL;
00113                         
00114                         // color
00115                         t_object *box;
00116                         t_jrgba colorvals;
00117                         jrgba_set(&colorvals, 0.30, 1.0, 0.15, 1.0);
00118                         object_obex_lookup((t_object *)x, gensym("#B"), &box);
00119                         jbox_set_color(box, &colorvals);
00120                 }
00121                 return (x);
00122         }

00128                 ;

00133         void OMax_state2id_assist(t_OMax_state2id *x, void *b, long io, long index, char *s)
00134         {
00135                 switch (io)
00136                 {
00137                         case 1: // inlet
00138                                 sprintf(s, "state number, set [symbol] changes sequence to read");
00139                                 break;
00140                         case 2: // outlet
00141                                 switch(index)
00142                         {
00143                                 case 0: // leftmost
00144                                         sprintf(s, "end date");
00145                                         break;
00146                                 case 1:
00147                                         sprintf(s, "begin date");
00148                                         break;
00149                         }
00150                 }
00151         }
00152         
00154         
00156 
00157         
00160         bool OMax_state2id_bind(t_OMax_state2id *x)
00161         {
00163                 if (x->obound == FALSE)
00164                 {
00166                         if ((x->oname) && (x->oname->s_thing) && (ob_sym(x->oname->s_thing) == gensym("OMax.oracle")))
00167                         {
00168                                 x->oracle = &(((t_OMax_oracle*)(x->oname->s_thing))->oracle);
00169                                 // If binding is ok, then don't do it next time.
00170                                 x->obound = TRUE;
00171                         }
00172                         else
00173                         {
00174                 if (x->oname)
00175                                 object_error((t_object *)x,"No Oracle %s declared", x->oname->s_name);
00176                 else
00177                     object_error((t_object *)x,"No oracle name given");
00178                         }
00179                 }
00180                 return x->obound;
00181         }
00182         
00184         
00186 
00187         
00191         void OMax_state2id_do(t_OMax_state2id *x, long statnb)
00192         {
00193                 if (OMax_state2id_bind(x)&&(x->oname->s_thing))
00194                 {
00195                         ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->readcount));
00196                         if(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->wflag == FALSE)
00197                         {
00198                                 if ((statnb>=0) && (statnb<(long)(x->oracle->get_size())))
00199                                 {
00200                     outlet_int(x->out_begindate,(*x->oracle).get_date(statnb)); // output begin
00201                     outlet_int(x->out_enddate,(*x->oracle).get_date(statnb+1)); // output end
00202                                 }
00203                         }
00204                         else
00205                                 object_error((t_object *)x,"Oracle %s busy",x->oname->s_name);
00206                         ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&(((t_OMax_oracle *)(x->oname->s_thing))->readcount));
00207                 }
00208         }
00209         
00213         void OMax_state2id_setname(t_OMax_state2id *x, t_symbol *s)
00214         {
00215                 x->oname = s;
00216                 x->obound = FALSE;
00217                 OMax_state2id_bind(x);
00218         }

00221 }
